article_title: Think Under 50 Employees Definitely Means No Obamacare? Think Again

article_metadata.description: Like it or not, Obamacare put the IRS in the health care business. Now, a huge new slug of IRS Final Regulations has hit the books defining full-time employees that employers must cover. Under the Affordable Care Act, an assessable payment or employer shared responsibility payment—it’s easier to call it [...]
